summary: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.
cast: Atsuko Tanaka|Akio Ôtsuka|Kôichi Yamadera|Yutaka Nakano|Tamio Ôki|Tesshô Genda|Namaki Masakazu|Masato Yamanouchi|Shinji Ogawa|Mitsuru Miyamoto|Kazuhiro Yamaji|Shigeru Chiba|Hiroshi Yanaka|Ginzô Matsuo|Takashi Matsuyama|Sanryô Odaka|Masamichi Satô|Atsuko Hayashida|Yûji Ueda|Toshiki Kameyama|Atsushi Goto|Maaya Sakamoto|Iemasa Kayumi|Stephen Apostolina|Steve Blum|Steve Bulen|Richard Cansino|Gina Connell|Dorothy Elias-Fahn|Richard Epcar|Michael Forest|Leo Gray|Meg Hamilton|Milton James|Christopher Joyce|William Frederick Knight|Joan Mason|Gilbert Navarro|Wanda Nowicki|Gloria Oldman|Ben Parks|Scott Prensor|Simon Prescott|Debra Rogers|Joe Romersa|Donald Salin|Lia Sargent|Kevin Seymour|Sam Sheffer|Michael Sorich|Peter Spellos|Doug Stone|Phil Williams|Amy Wong|Mimi Woods|Tom Wyner
title: Ghost in the Shell
